Architectural plan for the Binh Que
Thanh Da peninsula, covering nearly 427 hectares, the Department of Planning
and Architecture has just submitted to the City People's Committee for approval
related exam questions with the goal of finding the
optimal solution to turn this peninsula into an urban area.
Modern sustainable ecological urban area
promotes the city's economic development
according to the report of the Department of Planning and
Architecture. The scope of planning research
is the entire Binh Quy Thanh Da peninsula in
Ward 28, Binh Thanh district and one area.  In some
areas opposite the banks of the Saigon River,
especially the Longevity Urban Area of
Thu Duc City and Binh Thanh District, five units with the
capacity and conditions to pass the preliminary examination
will participate in the exam
and will be provided with questions and answers.  Plan design ideas
in B to S weeks for judging. When
the results are available, the city will select
important contents to include in the general planning adjustment project,
about 6.5 km from the city center on the Binh Peninsula.  Thanh Da town
is currently the only place with a lot of vacant land funds
capable of investing in urban development
within a radius of 10 km from the
existing central area. Previously, this urban area
was approved and called for investment in
2019.  1992 However, due to the large scale and
total investment capital of more than 30,000 billion VND,
complicated site clearance, after
many changes of investors, the
project has not yet been
implemented yesterday after urgent consultation.  From
16 ministries and agencies, the Ministry of Labor,
War Invalids and Social Affairs has submitted to the government a
plan for Tet holiday on National Day
September 2, 2024, according to which next year civil
servants and workers are expected to have
17 days off, including 11 days off.  official day and 6
consecutive days of compensatory leave due to falling on the weekend
according to the plan submitted to the government for the Lunar New Year holiday, which is
expected to last 7 days from the 29th of the last month of
Quy Mao to the end of the fifth day of the first lunar month of
Giap on the occasion of National Day.  The proposed
4-day holiday for the remaining holidays of
2024 will be implemented according to the provisions of the
labor code, specifically, New Year's Day,
3-day holiday. Do To Hung Vuong, one day off,
Unification Day, and International Labor Day,
two calendar days off.  The above leave applies to
civil servants, but the Ministry of Labor,
War Invalids and Social Affairs encourages
businesses to give workers a
separate holiday schedule for the Lunar New Year. Businesses
give 30 days notice to
foreign workers.  Working in Vietnam,
in addition to the general schedule, they also have an additional day off for the
traditional Tet holiday and one day for their
country's national day.
Last night in Hanoi, the Central Committee of the
Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union in coordination
with the Ministry of Science and Technology organized a  The
20th anniversary of the
Golden Globe Science and Technology Awards honors
young talents in the field of information technology
and Vietnamese science and technology
at the ceremony of 10 young talents with
outstanding achievements in various fields.  The field of
information technology, digital transformation and
automation, Medical Technology,
Environmental Technology and new materials technology has
received the 2023 Golden Globe Award, in
addition, the 20 best female students
nationwide have been awarded.
Vietnam Science and Technology Female Student Award 2023
spoke at the ceremony. Vice President
Vo Thi Anh Xuan congratulated and
praised the young talent winning the award and
suggested continuing research to propose
more policies.  Attract
domestic and foreign science and technology talents to create
conditions for young people to have the opportunity to
develop their talents.
This year, the flood waters in the

for elementary school students,

Therefore, people are hoping that the

The police arrested Thang and searched

Finally, an update,
ladies and gentlemen. This morning, Vietnam time, the
United Nations General Assembly approved
passed a resolution calling for an
immediate, lasting and peaceful humanitarian ceasefire
in
Gaza The United Nations General Assembly
voted after the Security Council
failed to pass a resolution four times
in two weeks.  Through the
latest resolution passed with 120 votes
in favor, 14 votes against and 45 abstentions, the
resolution drafted by Arab countries
is not binding but carries
political weight, emphasizing the
importance of preventing illegal activities.  unrest and
further escalation of violence in the region and
calls on all parties to exercise
maximum restraint while demanding access to
aid for Gaza and the protection of
civilians. The General Assembly also resolutely
rejects all efforts to  Force coercion of
Palestinian civilians in Gaza Moved south
while calling for the immediate release
and false conditions of all civilians
being illegally detained. However, the
Israeli ambassador to the United Nations responded.
